description: A grade 1 endometrioid adenocarcinoma extensively involves the endometrial mucosa with superficial (<50%) myometrial invasion, negative cervical and parametrial tissues, and no nodal metastases (pT1a, N0).
patient_notes: Your pathology shows a low-grade endometrial cancer confined to the uterus with shallow invasion and no spread to lymph nodes. You have already undergone removal of the uterus and ovaries, and no further treatment is likely needed. We will monitor you closely with regular follow-up exams and imaging to ensure there is no recurrence.
